Welcome to PromptOptimizer!#

Reduce #Tokens, Save $$$

Getting Started#

Checkout the github repo: TimeTraveller-San/PromptOptimizer

Documentations#

Following are the documentations for optimzier and metrics:

Metrics#

class prompt_optimizer.metric.BERTScoreMetric#

BERTScoreMetric between the prompt and optmized prompt.

Args:

class prompt_optimizer.metric.Metric#
class prompt_optimizer.metric.TokenMetric(tokenizer='cl100k_base')#

Reduction in number of tokens as tokenized by tiktoken.

Args:
tokenizer (str): Name for the tiktoken tokenizer

cl100k_base by default.

Prompt Optimizer#

class prompt_optimizer.poptim.LemmatizerOptim(verbose=False, metrics=[])#
class prompt_optimizer.poptim.NameReplaceOptim(verbose=False, metrics=[])#
class prompt_optimizer.poptim.PromptOptimize(verbose=False, metrics=[])#
class prompt_optimizer.poptim.PulpOptim(aggression=0.4, verbose=False, metrics=[])#

This doesn’t really reduce #tokens

class prompt_optimizer.poptim.PunctuationOptim(verbose=False, metrics=[])#

This doesn’t really reduce #tokens

class prompt_optimizer.poptim.StemmerOptim(verbose=False, metrics=[])#

This doesn’t really reduce #tokens

class prompt_optimizer.poptim.StopWordOptim(verbose=False, metrics=[])#
